# The `ReplayInlineAdvisor` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

Replay inline advisor that uses optimization remarks from inlining of previous build to guide current inlining.

This is useful for inliner tuning.

Definition at line 64 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/replayinlineadvisor-h">ReplayInlineAdvisor.h</a>.
